description: This story humorously brings to life a snowman with a six-pack, named Frosty, and a curious squirrel named Nutty.
title: Frosty's Fit Adventure
n_1: In a snowy garden, Frosty proudly shows off his six-pack.
n_3: Frosty tries to teach Nutty snowga poses.
c2_3: I'm more of a nut-cracker than a snowga master.
n_4: They laugh together, enjoying the snowy day.
c2_4: You're not just cool, you're snow-cool!
